message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $10,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $10,000 is a bit too high for me.  Would you consider $6,000?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $10,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $9,000. This is my best offer.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit.  $9,000 is still more than I had in mind.  Could you do $7,000?
Bob, I'm trying to be flexible, but $7,000 is cutting it too close. How about we meet in the middle at $8,500? This is my final offer.
Alice, I understand you're firm on your price, but I'm on a tight budget.  I could do $7,500, but that's really as high as I can go.
